Learn how to tell stories with data

A one day interactive session to learn about storytelling and data visualisation together, in a hands on session.

Playbook

The NarrativeViz Playbook is my way to share how to tell visual stories with data by way of clear and thoughtfully organized lessons.

I am offering "plays" that have worked for me. I trust your judgement to decide which approaches and tools might work better for you.

Check out the playbook outline.
